Author: therealspicylemon
Text: Jesus christ, this made me so sad to read. I hate parents who have kids just to treat them like shit. You don’t deserve any of this, but I’m sure you know that. I don’t know you, but I can tell you’re incredibly strong. You’ve gotten through all of that and you’re still trucking along.  As another commentor said, definitely see a therapist if/when you can. You can get through this, I wish you the best ❤️

Author: Eusea
Text: I have no idea what to say other than that this must suck so fucking bad. Advice wise If you think it would be beneficial you could look into getting a therapist to see if you dont currently have one.
